payload.subject: orchestrator-system-fixes-complete
payload.description:
SYSTEM FIXES DEPLOYED - RESTART REQUIRED

CRITICAL FIXES COMPLETED:
✓ cli-identity.sh: BASH_SOURCE compatibility fixed (lines 12, 150)
✓ cli-identity.sh: Python boolean conversion fixed
✓ Coordination messages: All blocking issues acknowledged
✓ Planning rules: Clarified in parallel-coordination.md
✓ P05-F06 cleanup: Uncommitted files removed

YOUR PREVIOUS BLOCKING ISSUES:
1. Identity activation failures (BASH_SOURCE errors) → FIXED
2. Workflow violation (skipped planning phase) → Guidance provided in msg-2818ba26
3. Wrong branch (agent/* instead of ui/*) → Instructions provided
4. JSON formatting in coordination messages → FIXED

ACTION REQUIRED:
1. RESTART your CLI session to pick up fixes
2. Run: source scripts/cli-identity.sh frontend
3. Verify: echo $CLAUDE_INSTANCE_ID (should show 'frontend')
4. Check messages: ./scripts/coordination/check-messages.sh
5. Read orchestrator guidance in msg-2818ba26
6. Follow 8-step recovery process to restart P05-F06 properly

CRITICAL REMINDERS:
- .workitems/ is SHARED (you create .workitems/P05-*)
- ALWAYS create planning artifacts FIRST (even with inline plans)
- ALWAYS start session with identity activation
- ALWAYS work on ui/* branches for P05 features

CORRECT P05-F06 WORKFLOW:
1. git checkout -b ui/P05-F06-hitl-ui-v2
2. ./scripts/new-feature.sh P05 F06 "hitl-ui-v2"
3. Populate design.md, tasks.md, user_stories.md
4. Commit planning artifacts
5. THEN implement with TDD

SESSION START CHECKLIST:
□ source scripts/cli-identity.sh frontend
□ Verify CLAUDE_INSTANCE_ID is set
□ Check branch matches ui/* prefix
□ Acknowledge any pending messages
□ Run: ./scripts/check-compliance.sh --session-start

All systems now operational. Ready for you to proceed correctly.
